directions: Process scallions, zest and basil in a food processor until minced. Add lemon juice and cream cheese; pulse until combined. Transfer to a small bowl. Stir in tuna, and season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate.
ingredients: 6 ounces canned white albacore tuna, drained and broken into small chunks
title: Herbed Cream Cheese With Scallions and Tuna
